forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dips low, painting the sky in soft hues of blue, tonight in Downtown San Francisco promises a serene clarity. The evening is mostly clear, with a gentle breeze whispering through the streets, and temperatures sliding down to a comfortable 50 degrees. The pinpricks of light from the city begin to come alive against a backdrop of fading daylight, presenting a setting that invites a stroll along the waterfront or a cozy gathering at a nearby café.

Tomorrow holds the promise of a sun-drenched Saturday, heralding highs near 64 degrees with a soothing warmth as the afternoon unfolds. The tranquility of the current conditions suggests little in the way of fog, with the iconic views of the Golden Gate Bridge shimmering in the distance. Given the pleasant forecast, light layers will serve you well—perhaps a light sweater to accompany a casual outing, allowing for flexibility as the day warms. Activities could lean toward the leisurely: a visit to one of the parks for a quiet afternoon, an art exhibit that beckons your curiosity, or simply enjoying a moment of contemplation on a bench, soaking in the graceful beauty of the city at this enchanting time of year.
